name: Bunker Bumrush Demo
description:
Bunker Bumrush is a retro-styled, vertical scrolling platformer. You can play in Singleplayer or Multiplayer (local / online via Parsec). In Singleplayer, the objective is to get as deep as you can in the bunker without dying. In Multiplayer, you must kill your friends, but most importantly stay alive. Use the item generators to help you survive.

JOIN OUR DISCORD HERE!

The game supports:

  • Keyboard (Arrow Keys, Z, X) 
  • Controller (Xbox and PlayStation).
